name: Plagueheart Belt
tooltip:
Plagueheart BeltLevel 60

Mataus the Wrathcaster at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make a Plagueheart Belt if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Belt, 8 Wartorn Cloth Scraps, 2 Arcane Crystals and 2 Mooncloth.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Belt
- Wartorn Cloth Scrap x 8
- Arcane Crystal x 2
- Mooncloth x 2
